Configure Project/Archive Locking

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Archives | Locking) to:

  • Permit a User to lock more than one revision of an archive and/or permit more than one lock per revision.
  • Permit more than one lock per revision.
  • Remove the lock when checking in an unchanged revision.

Field Descriptions

Archives | Locking
Locks Allowed On Each Revision Do one of the following:
Select One to allow only one lock per revision.
Select More Than One to allow multiple locks per revision.
Locks Allowed By Each User Do one of the following:
Select One to allow only one lock per User.
Select More Than One to allow multiple locks per User.
Remove lock on unchanged revision Select this check box to remove the lock on an unchanged revision upon check in and to not increment the tip revision number. If you do not select this option, Version Manager cancels the check in and the lock remains in force.

See Also

Setting Locking Options Locking Options
